mapper.update:
update plant
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stationId = #{stationid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
powerRating = #{powerrating,jdbcType=REAL},
cutInWindSpeed = #{cutinwindspeed,jdbcType=REAL},
cutOffWindSpeed = #{cutoffwindspeed,jdbcType=REAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update plant set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stationId = #{stationid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, powerRating = #{powerrating,jdbcType=REAL}, cutInWindSpeed = #{cutinwindspeed,jdbcType=REAL}, cutOffWindSpeed = #{cutoffwindspeed,jdbcType=REAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
